lsoa.description: Statistics for lower layer super output areas (LSOA)

parks.description: Parks within 1km of the point of interest, sorted by descending area

schools.description: Schools within 1km of the point of interest, sorted by ascending distance from the POI

lastInpectionUrl.description: URL to the last inspection report

lastInspectionDate.description: Date of the last Ofsted inspection

leadershipAndManagement.description: Leadership and management grade in the last Ofsted report, from 1 (outstanding) to 4 (inadequate)

overallEffectiveness.description: Overall effectiveness grade in the last Ofsted report, from 1 (outstanding) to 4 (inadequate)

qualityOfTeaching.description: Quality of teaching grade in the last Ofsted report, from 1 (outstanding) to 4 (inadequate)
